lines.text: You bitch! You dirty bitch! You cheated me! You ugly bitch! I made love to you again and again, and you weren't dead! You didn't die! You didn't die! But now I'm back to finish my work. And then you'll be mine forever!
Hmm. Who is this guy, anyway?
His name is John Lucker. A few years ago, he murdered eight girls. Raped them afterwards. And when I mean afterwards, I mean while some of the corpses were decomposing!
I knew you would change your mind... It won't hurt, I promise you... It will be marvellous!
